com.glkwhr.snakegame

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glkwhr.snakegame.Snake

  • public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
    Snake class contains information and behavior of the snake.
    Since:
    Aug 28, 2017
    Author:
    H.W.
